short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extention allows standard users to suscribe to topics on neobux's forum, relying on RSS feeds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This application will allow you to suscribe to topics on neobux's forum, even if you are a standard user.
Basically it's an RSS reader which also eases the process to get the RSS feed and pops up notifications
